article.title: ITT Wins Navy Radar Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: ITT Corporation has been awarded a $169.3 million contract from U.S. Naval Sea Systems (NAVSEA) Command as part of the AN/SPS-48G Radar Obsolescence, Availability Recovery (ROAR) program. The five-year contract has a base value of $29 million, plus options for four subsequent annual awards.
